common.profile_info_desc: These details let us know more about you. Also, it will be printed on your invoices and claims.
common.thiqeel_desc: The 1st Online Auctioneer for Heavy Equipment is KSA
common.invitation_member_desc: Copy and share the invitation link below or add their emails and we will send them invitation emails
common.account_type_desc: Switch you account type to Business if you represent a Company. You will be able to invite members to this account to bid or sell together effortlessly.
common.summary_description: Follow-up all your statistics on joined bids or your equipments you have listed for selling.
common.sell_listing_description: Sell your equipment over Thiqeel and get help from expert consultants step by step until listed for bidding and getting the highest price.
common.Categories_of_interesting_desc: Choose the categories you are interested in to get notified when new auctions are listed.
common.notification_desc: Mange how do you need to get notified by Thiqeel.
common.password_security_desc: Manage your login credentials anytime to protect your account and be safe.
common.change_password_desc: Change your password to protect your account and be safe.
common.shipping_address_desc: Add your address that will be used for delivery. By default we use your billing details as your shipping address. You can add more than one address for different locations to ship your equipment to.
